abstract: Was Bank of America, known for its acquisitive streak, considering swallowing rival behemoth Citigroup?
lead_paragraph: Was Bank of America, known for its acquisitive streak, considering swallowing rival behemoth Citigroup?

headline.main: Citi Said to Reject Proposal for BofA Merger

abstract: Wall Street firms are cutting costs and tightening belts these days — just try ordering a new BlackBerry at Bank of America. This could accelerate a cost-cutting trend that was already gaining momentum: The outsourcing of junior research and investment banking activities to India, where analysis and pitchbooks come far more cheaply than in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street firms are cutting costs and tightening belts these days — just try ordering a new BlackBerry at Bank of America. This could accelerate a cost-cutting trend that was already gaining momentum: The outsourcing of junior research and investment banking activities to India, where analysis and pitchbooks come far more cheaply than in the United States.

headline.main: Wall Street Research, Made in India
